name: Auto Link Tags
author: Patricio Tarantino

sections.description:
Instead of do it manually, write your post and add your tags. Automatically, this plugin will scan the content of your post and will create links to your tags pages.

In this way, each time a term appears in your post, it will contain a link which will be good for SEO purposes.
sections.installation:
1. Upload autolinktags to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress admin.

That’s all!
sections.faq:
Can I choose manually which terms will be linked?

In this initial version, everything works automatically so no, there are no options to configure or terms to pre-select. However, this may change in future versions.
